page.title: 08MY FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My family life is different to most people because my dad doesn't live with me. I see him most days, Monday, Wednesday, Thursday and Sunday. Sometimes he will see me when he does not go to work on Saturday and he will take me down town and buy something. He works every day except Sunday. On Sundays he will come to see me play football for my Sunday League team or watch me play tennis. My mum goes to work as a dinner lady at mid-day and then works as a cleaner in the evening. My brother is nine years old and goes to primary school. I am in the second year at secondary school.
